full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 RONALD H. BONAPARTE SUITE 706 GUARANTY BUILDING ATTORNEY AT LAW SUITE 1620 6331 HOLLYWOOD BOULEVARD 3600 WILSHIRE BOULEVARD HOLLYWOOD, CALIFORNIA 90028 April 24, 1967 LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90005 213-HOLLYWOOD 3.2500 213-DUNKIRK 5-8351 213-HOLLYWOOD 3.2104 PLEASE REPLY TO. Hollywood office Inspector Swanson Petition Division, Travel Control United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service 300 North Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 Dear Sir: Enclosed please find the following documents for your in- spection and consideration: 1. One copy of Petition Form I-130, executed by Ming-Lo Chin on behalf of her daughter, Lee Chai Pao; 2. One copy of Petition Form I-130, executed by Ming-Lo Chin on behalf of her daughter, Lee Chai Li; 3. One copy of Petition Form I-130, executed by Ming-Lo Chin on behalf of her husband, Lee Yu-Han; 4. Alien Registration Card No. A14 612 729, issued to Ming-Lo Chin; 5. One original and one photocopy of the marriage certifi- cate, with translation, of Ming-Lo Chin and Lee Yu-Han; 6. One copy of the birth certificate, issued by Consulado Geral da Republica da China, Sao Paulo, Brazil, for Miss Lee Chai Pao; 7. One copy of the birth certificate, issued by Consulado Geral da Republica da China, Sao Paulo, Brazil, for Miss Lee Chai Li; 8. One copy of Form G-28; 9. Money order of $30.00, the fee for three petitions. Will you kindly transmit the approved petitions to the American Consulate in Sao Paulo, Brazil. Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Very truly yours, Ronald H. Bonaparte RHB:jk
